abstract: Serena Williams leaves competition, due to knee inflammation, during her Hopman Cup match in Perth, Australia; other tennis news noted.

headline.print_headline: Williams Joins Others on Injured List
headline.main: Serena Williams Joins Others on Injured List

snippet: Williams retired during her Hopman Cup match. Other injured players include Maria Sharapova and Simona Halep at the Brisbane International in Australia.
lead_paragraph: Williams retired during her Hopman Cup match. Other injured players include Maria Sharapova and Simona Halep at the Brisbane International in Australia.
